fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Mathematical Logic as based on the Theory of Types

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Impredicativity in the sense of Russellâ€™s Reducibility Axiom
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: pp. 241 of Mathematical Logic based on the Theory of Types

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The Axiom of Reducibility states that any truth function (i.e. propositional function) can be expressed by a formally equivalent predicative truth function.
